name: Black & White 2: Battle of the Gods
name_original: Black & White 2: Battle of the Gods
description:
Black & White 2: Battle of the Gods is a strategy game developed by Lionhead Studios. It came out on 25-04-2006. Electronic Arts published the game. Black & White 2: Battle of the Gods has a Metascore of 69, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Black & White 2: Battle of the Gods on PC.
